name: Meteor Hammer IO
description:
Use the left finger to move the character to drag the meteor hammer and collect the blade to fill the meteor hammer.
When you are close to other players, press the attack button and throw a meteor hammer attack!
Release the left hand finger and the character will be in the meteor hammer!
Survive to be the last man!

Features:
◉ Perfect design,Full of funny
◉ Multi-map multi-mode fun is endless!
◉ Multi-role pk
◉ Tablet support
◉ Global Leaderboards

Meteor Hammer IO is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and become the Meteor Hammer Master in world!
